text: <@U7BQUDTEJ> Are you swapping to a completely new template?  Basically, when creating a page and adding content to it, the content is linked to a unique ID that’s generated for the template modules.   So when you attribute a new template, it has a different ID and the content doesn’t know where to place itself.

Need some advice.  I made an edit to my custom module by simply clicking “remove” on a file I had uploaded from the FILE field type.  It instantly triggered this screen.

Been constantly refreshing, closing down the browser, and NOTHING…

How can I restore the module? Is there any sort of versioning I can access and revert to?
